required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Assessing Muscle Metabolic Phenotype by MSK Ultrasound
clinical_study.official_title: Assessment of Muscle Metabolic Phenotype by the Use of Point-of-care MSK Ultrasound Imaging.

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to test whether ultrasound images (pictures) can be used as a valid assessment of muscle quality in different muscle groups during Intensive Care stay. This new approach would allow clinicians to obtain frequent skeletal muscle images and would enable doctors to observe any changes over time in muscle quality that could occur during ICU stay.
Participants in this study will have ultrasound images made of their leg-, chest- and jaw muscles taken on every day until ICU discharge.

primary_outcome.measure: Muscle Quality from the rectus femoris, vastus lateralis, intermedius, intercostalis, temporalis and styloglossus
primary_outcome.time_frame: Minimum of every other day while in ICU (up to 10 days). Once discharged from ICU minimum of 3x a week until discharge (up to 3 weeks)
primary_outcome.description: Ultrasound-derived area of intramuscular adipose tissue (IMAT) and intramuscular glycogen content from the rectus femoris, vastus lateralis, intermedius, intercostalis, temporalis and styloglossus

primary_outcome.measure: Muscle volume and thickness from the rectus femoris, vastus lateralis, intermedius, intercostalis, temporalis and styloglossus
primary_outcome.time_frame: Minimum of every other day while in ICU (up to 10 days). Once discharged from ICU minimum of 3x a week until discharge (up to 3 weeks)
primary_outcome.description: Ultrasound-derived volume and thicknessfrom the rectus femoris, vastus lateralis, intermedius, intercostalis, temporalis and styloglossus

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes of Intramuscular adipose tissue (IMAT) content and muscle volume/thickness from the psoas at the Level of L3/L4
secondary_outcome.description: the change over time of (standard of care) CT-derived area of intramuscular adipose tissue in cm2

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes of Intramuscular adipose tissue (IMAT) content and muscle volume/thickness from the intercostal muscle at the Level of Th3/Th4
secondary_outcome.description: the change over time of (standard of care) CT-derived area of intramuscular adipose tissue in cm2

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes of Intramuscular adipose tissue (IMAT) content and muscle volume/thickness from the intercostal muscle at the Level of the head
secondary_outcome.description: the change over time of (standard of care) CT-derived area of intramuscular adipose tissue in cm2

arm_group.description: Any patient admitted to the Duke Trauma Center or Duke ICU will be approached to participate in this study.

study_pop.textblock: All patients admitted to a Duke Trauma center, SICU, MICO, or CT ICU

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- admission Duke Trauma center, SICU, MICU, or CT ICU
- >18 years of age
Exclusion Criteria:
- <18 years of age
- prisoners
